heading: HR00304
0: A RESOLUTION REQUESTING THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE PROPRIETY AND LEGALITY OF MANDATING PASSENGERS AT THE PUBLIC PORT OF DANAO CITY TO PASS THROUGH THE PRIVATE WAITING LOUNGE OF SANDS GATEWAY MALL, DANAO CITY, CEBU, AND TO PAY LOUNGE FEES IN ADDITION TO TERMINAL FEES, UNJUSTLY ADDING FINANCIAL BURDEN AND UNDULY HAMPERING PASSENGERS' CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHT TO TRAVEL
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00304
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION REQUESTING THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE PROPRIETY AND LEGALITY OF MANDATING PASSENGERS AT THE PUBLIC PORT OF DANAO CITY TO PASS THROUGH THE PRIVATE WAITING LOUNGE OF SANDS GATEWAY MALL, DANAO CITY, CEBU, AND TO PAY LOUNGE FEES IN ADDITION TO TERMINAL FEES, UNJUSTLY ADDING FINANCIAL BURDEN AND UNDULY HAMPERING PASSENGERS' CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHT TO TRAVEL
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : FRASCO, VINCENT FRANCO "DUKE" D.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-09-09;
